modules.name: EvenVCO
modules.description: Oscillator including even-harmonic waveform. Based on Befaco EvenVCO.

modules.name: Rampage
modules.description: Dual ramp generator. Based on Befaco Rampage.

modules.name: A*B+C
modules.description: Dual four-quadrant multiplier with VC offset. Based on Befaco A*B+C.

modules.name: Spring Reverb
modules.description: Spring reverb tank driver. Based on Befaco Spring Reverb.

modules.name: Mixer
modules.description: Four-channel mixer for audio or CV. Based on Befaco Mixer.

modules.name: Slew Limiter
modules.description: Voltage controlled slew limiter, AKA lag processor. Based on Befaco Slew Limiter.

modules.name: Dual Atenuverter
modules.description: Attenuates, inverts, and applies offset to a signal. Based on Befaco Dual Atenuverter.
